subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: At Yankee Stadium Tuesday, Chien-Ming Wang said he would dwell on his postseason starts for a month or two and next season, he would have to refine his changeup and slider.
snippet: At Yankee Stadium Tuesday, Chien-Ming Wang said he would dwell on his postseason starts for a month or two and next season, he would have to refine his changeup and slider.
